pkgmetadata.longdescription:
SICK Toolbox drivers for SICK laser rangefinders
This package contains the ROS fork of the SICK LIDAR Matlab/C++ Toolbox, available from http://sicktoolbox.sourceforge.net/.
The SICK LIDAR Matlab/C++ Toolbox offers stable and easy-to-use C++ drivers for SICK LMS 2xx and SICK LD LIDARs. Also included are config utilities, examples, and tutorials.
